top1_title_desc: Using Open source & Decentralized Encrypted communication super application
top1_supply_1: Beta versions for Mac, Windows, and Linux
top1_supply_2: Alpha version for iOS and Android
top_2_community_find_desc: Find your tribe in the virtual world of the truly free Status community
top_2_img_1: Explore the universe of autonomous communities
top_2_img_2b: Access token gated channel to qualify for airdrop
top_3_protect_authority_desc: Do not let Discord or Telegram have control over your community
top_4_chat_title_desc: Protect your right to free speech with decentralized messaging, metadata privacy, and end-to-end encryption
top_4_img_1a: Create and join ongoing group chats
top_4_img_1b: This is the Internet, verify your contacts
top_4_img_2: Send crypto coins to your friends directly via chat
top_5_title_desc: L2 makes it simple - send and manage your cryptocurrencies easily and securely across multiple networks.
top_5_img_1a: Complete self-custody.Nobody can stop you to using tokens.
top_5_img_1b: This is the Internet, verify your contacts
top_5_img_2: Send crypto coins to your friends directly via chat
top_6_title_desc: Trusted interaction with Web3 Dapps, DAOs, NFT, DeFi, and more.
top_6_img_2: Free from tracking and data collection
top_6_img_3: Full chain dApp connection. So you don't have to choose a chain.
top_7_left: Full chain dApp connection. So you don't have to choose a chain.
top_7_r_1b: Just like the operating system, no matter what you've been doing lately, it's just a few taps away. Go from chatting with friends to an account without going back
top_7_r_2b: A lot can happen through communities, one-on-one chats, wallet accounts, and Dapps! Stay in control with a global Notification center that lets you see everything happening in the web3 world at a glance.
top_7_r_3b: Customize your status! Choose an avatar and color to represent yourself, choose a light or dark pattern, choose an emoji to represent your account, and then see how the app will present the characteristics of the community you joined.
top_7_r_4b: Different online identities? Or share a device with family or friends? No problem, Status fully supports switching between multiple completely separate identities.
top_8_1: It's better to use a key card
top_9_card_1b: Build applications to uphold human rights, protect free speech, and protect privacy
top_9_card_2b: Participate in the governance of Status and help guide the development of SNT.
top_9_card_3b: Keep watching on development progress as we build truly decentralized super applications.
